optProblem

Interface OptProblem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StochasticOptProblem

    public interface OptProblem
    Author:
    group2

    OptProblem is used in the Main and allows us to give alternative implementations of optimization problems. Main

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      This method should work as a constructor for an optimization problem, setting up everything that is needed for the simulate and run methods.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(int max_indss,
                double max_timee,
                int dmean,
                int mmean,
                int rmean,
                Map m,
                Point pi,
                Point pf,
                int kk,
                int num_inds_init)
        This method should work as a constructor for an optimization problem, setting up everything that is needed for the simulate and run methods.

        Most of the parameters are self explanatory since they are the ones in the project paper.

        Parameters:
        max_indss - is the maximum number of individuals in the
        max_timee - is the maximum simulation time
        dmean - is the constant to multiply when getting the death mean for the exponential
        mmean - is the constant to multiply when getting the move mean for the exponential
        rmean - is the constant to multiply when getting the reproduction mean for the exponential
        m - is the Map that we want to use in this optimization problem
        pi - is the initial point where individuals should start
        pf - is the final point that we want to achieve
        kk - is the comfort sensitivity
        num_inds_init - is the starting number of individuals

      • simulate

        void simulate()
        This method is responsible for running the simulation itself.

      • runOptimizationProblem

        void runOptimizationProblem(java.lang.String filename)
        This method is the whole problem in one. It should open the file specified in the arguments, parse it accordingly, initialize que optimization problem and then call the simulate method.
        Parameters:
        filename - is the name of the file containing the test
